CustomField.description: This field will be manually updated by users with 'SL_Opportunity_Edit_Is Tender Reviewed'. This field will be used by China Sales team to manage their Tender process. Jira Story # CMCM-3832
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TAM must upload tender supporting doc using the "Notes & Attachments" feature. GC Channel Ops or Comm Deals team may select the checkbox to confirm doc is reviewed.
CustomField.label: Is Tender Reviewed?
